name: Zombie Break
description:
Users who play the game must destroy zombies in each and every one

the level uses the bullet provided. Every level that has succeeded
passed and will continue to the next level, will be given a different challenge
that is in the form of the number of zombies that will increase each level.
So that it causes different difficulties each level, because with
the number of zombies that increases automatically the user must destroy the zombies
increasingly difficult. More and more zombies are killed at each level, the user
will find the value or the higher score. And if bullets are provided
from the beginning only 1x chance, then the user must be good at controlling bullets
The target is to hit the target and if the bullet falls it cannot
reflected back towards the zombie then the game will end and the user will
get the appropriate value at the last position at that time.
